refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: An anchor identifies a single spot in the content. This may serve as the target for a cross reference, for example, from a Link. The Anchor element may occur almost anywhere.
Anchor has the Role attribute and all of the common attributes except Lang.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Anchor has no content and generally produces no output. It is a link target.
